string.value: This is your second assignment as an informant and you must relay #p1032112#'s eyewitness account to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k.

#p1032101# is sure that the changes happening to the #o1110100#s is connected with the kid carrying the puppets and tells you to be extra cautious. Now that this case is pretty much wrapped up, you should relay the information to #b#p1002104##k.

You told #p1002104# why the #o1110100#s have become so aggressive, and that concluded your second assignment as an informant. But you wonder, will the fairies be able to watch over the forest all by themselves?

Oh, this time you're back quickly. It must have been easier than the last assignment. Anyway, so what's the reason the Green Mushrooms in #m101000000# have become violent?\n#b#L0#(You tell him what happened in #m101000000#, and that the reason the Green Mushrooms are acting out might have to do with the puppet that a kid was carrying around.)#l\n#k
A kid carrying a puppetâ€¦ that's unusual. This proves the theory that #rsomeone is deliberately making the monsters behave more violently#k...
Okay, thanks for this valuable piece of information. This is what I'd call lucrative information.

Okay, your task is complete, so you should rest up until I call you for another assignment. As a bonafide hero, I think it'd be best if you can spend your free time training. I'll let you know if there are any updates on this situation when you're around Level 23. In the mean time, if you find any information on the kid with the puppets, let me know.

In any case, I wonder if the fairies will be able to manage the #o1110100#s. It'll be pretty difficult to control them all. Maybe it'll be good idea for you to return to Ellinia and find out if they need any help.
By the way, what got your interested in the #o1110100#s in the first place? You don't look like someone that'd be interested in the #o1110100#s. Did #bsomeone#k send you here?
